alert.note: Alert for Larimer County Below 6000 Feet, Northwest Weld County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued May 20 at 6:50PM MDT until May 21 at 9:00AM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...LATE SPRING STORM TO BRING HEAVY SNOW TO THE MOUNTAINS, FOOTHILLS, AND FRONT RANGE URBAN CORRIDOR... .Heavy snow will continue to spread south across the mountains and foothills this afternoon and early evening. The heavy snow will accumulate on trees, causing some tree limbs to break and produce scattered power outages. Do not park under trees and avoid walking under snow laden trees. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM MDT SATURDAY... ...WINTER STORM WARNING IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Snow ongoing. Additional snow accumulations up to two inches. * WHERE...Fort Collins. * WHEN...Until 9 AM MDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel may become slick due to slush accumulation on roadways during periods of heavier snowfall later this evening.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for Colorado can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or by going to www.cotrip.org.

area.areaDesc: Larimer County Below 6000 Feet, Northwest Weld County
